mapper.sql: trial_id, name, detail, img_url, category_id, branch_id, lecturer_id, release_time, status
mapper.insert: insert into trial(name, detail, img_url, category_id, branch_id, lecturer_id, release_time, status) values(#{name}, #{detail}, #{imgUrl}, #{categoryId}, #{branchId}, #{lecturerId}, #{releaseTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: select trial_id, name, detail, img_url, category_id, category_name, enterprise_id, enterprise_name, branch_id, branch_name, lecturer_id, lecturer_name, release_time, status from view_trial_detail where trial_id=#{trialId}
mapper.update: update trial set name=#{name}, detail=#{detail}, img_url=#{imgUrl}, category_id=#{categoryId}, branch_id=#{branchId}, lecturer_id=#{lecturerId}, release_time=#{releaseTime}, status=#{status} where trial_id=#{trialId}
mapper.select: select trial_id, name, img_url, category_id, category_name, enterprise_id, enterprise_name, branch_id, branch_name, lecturer_id, lecturer_name, release_time, status from view_trial_detail where enterprise_id=#{enterpriseId} and status='AVAILABLE' order by release_time desc limit 0, #{n}
